titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to recognize the time required to save funds for the college education of adopted children.

bill.summary: 4/12/1999--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to set forth a formula to adjust the amount of required family contribution for parents of dependent children in cases where such children are adopted.
